name: Caretaker Sacrifice
description: An epic sci-fi 6DOF adventure, puzzle and shooter featuring the voice of David Hewlett (Stargate). At the end of time, struggle through a hostile alien machine to solve the ultimate mystery and fulfil your final mission.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader model 3 DirectX: Version 9.0c
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Shader model 3 DirectX: Version 11
